description: [WastedLocker](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0612) can modify registry values within the Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Internet Settings\ZoneMap registry key.(Citation: NCC Group WastedLocker June 2020)

external_references.description: Antenucci, S., Pantazopoulos, N., Sandee, M. (2020, June 23). WastedLocker: A New Ransomware Variant Developed By The Evil Corp Group. Retrieved September 14, 2021.
